content: DX 351-CT Powder-actuated tool Fully automatic powder actuated, high-productivity and compact tool for attaching ceiling fasteners to concrete or steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Can be fastened while standing on the floor using the DX pole tool Light weight, slim and compact â€“ for better handling in tight spaces Gravitational safety device helps to prevent unintentional firing Contact pressure safety mechanism Applications Attaching suspended ceilings to concrete or to steel Overhead fastening to concrete or steel Fastening electrical elements and HVAC straps ### TECHNICAL DATA:Dimensions (LxWxH): 21.5 x 2.2 x 6.5 inWeight: 6 lb.Fastener Intake: Single Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 21.5 x 2.2 x 6.5 in | Weight | 6 lb | Fastener Intake | Single | Fastener length range | 0.47 - 1.46 in | Cartridge type | 6.8/11 M10 | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | No | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 275 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-P8-351 CT ### ITEMS- 3560961 -
